dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Rescued Time​</line-height>
dataList.desc: Have 1000 [LimitedTime] at the start of the Encounter

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Accelerated Regeneration​</line-height>
dataList.desc: Turn End: หาก a Part is broken, spend 100 Time จาก that Part to recover จาก Part Broken state ในเทิร์นหน้า

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Everyone's Time​</line-height>
dataList.desc: At 75% HP, enter the second phase. Upon phase change, recover ค่าสติ up to 30, และ divide the [LimitedTime] between all Parts as [OwnTime].

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Equal Expense​</line-height>
dataList.desc: Turn End: ได้รับ [EquitableDistribution].

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>For the Time Community​</line-height>
dataList.desc: Turn Start: All Parts ได้รับ 5 [Protection].
